name: Non-Cook Divinity
author: Shirley Drury

ingredients.name: pkg. Betty Crocker Fluffy White Frosting mix (dry)

instructions: In large bowl combine dry frosting mix, white syrup, vanilla and boiling water. Beat at high speed for five minutes. Add powdered sug- ar, gradually. Beat at low speed. Add pecans. Dip with teaspoon onto waxed paper.
